response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which we believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and potential impact, we estimate its value to be well above $800,000. Considering this, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is a special opportunity to acquire a high-value asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to discussing how this product can benefit you and your business. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 750000}
